'''Golden Shrimp Balls''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Golden Shrimp Balls is obtainable from [[Ms. Yu]] after reaching [[Reputation]] Level 1 in [[Liyue]].

Depending on the quality, Golden Shrimp Balls revives and restores '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Recipe==
{{Recipe
|type = Cooking
|Shrimp Meat = 5
|Potato = 4
|Flour = 3
|sort = Shrimp Meat,Potato,Flour
}}

==Trivia==
*While [[Keqing]] does not have a special interaction while cooking this dish, it is [[Keqing/Voice-Overs|her favorite dish]].
